para.text: dialog box is used to specify a variety of options in MODFLOW.
determines whether or not flow between adjacent specified-head cells is calculated. Activating this option will slow down MODFLOW slightly.
should be activated if solute transport is simulated with the Ground-Water Transport (GWT) process.
is active, MODFLOW will print the beginning, ending, and elapsed time required for the model to execute.

is the value that will be printed or saved for head in cells that were inactive since the beginning of the simulation. It is generally best to specify a value outside the range of heads that will be calculated by the model.

is the value that will be printed or saved for head in cells that have converted to a dry state since the beginning of the simulation. It is generally best to specify a value outside the range of heads that will be calculated by the model.

are the length and time units respectively used in the model for all input and output. For example, if the length of the cells is measured in meters and the time steps are measured in days, the units for the pumping rate in wells would have to be specified in m

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:8pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:super; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Open listing file in text editor when model is done.
If this check box is checked, the text editor specified in the
dialog box will be used to open the main output file from the model once the model is finished.
